page.title: My Vocabulary Sets
page.description: Manage and learn with {count} vocabulary sets
page.alertNote: Note: You can create flashcards from highlights (including highlights you created previously) on the practice detail page.

empty.noResultsDesc: Try searching with a different keyword
empty.noSetsDesc: Create your first vocabulary set to start learning

page.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this vocabulary set?

error.create: An error occurred while creating the vocabulary set
error.delete: An error occurred while deleting the vocabulary set

detail.alertNote: Note: you can learn a maximum of 20 new words per day. This is the appropriate amount for effective learning.

empty.title: No vocabulary yet
empty.description: Add vocabulary to this set to start learning

detail.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this word from the vocabulary set?

error.remove: An error occurred while removing the word
error.practice: An error occurred while creating the practice session

alert.selectWord: Select a word to view details

startSearch.title: Start searching
startSearch.description: Enter English vocabulary in the search box to look up definitions

noData.title: Unable to load data
noData.description: An error occurred while searching for vocabulary

noResults.title: No results found
noResults.description: No vocabulary found for "{query}" in the dictionary. Try searching with a different keyword.

noSelection.title: No vocabulary selected
noSelection.description: Select a vocabulary from the search list to view detailed definitions
